content.rendered:
Our themes are amazing assets

Great tools for building your next successful project

Creating or redesigning a blog, news, magazine, business, hobby or shop website has never been easier. Discover the art of publishing!

Newspaper

News & Multipurpose

Newspaper is the best WordPress Theme, a complete toolkit for web design, that helps you create and manage your project without any coding skills. Join over 100,000+ happy customers today!

Discover more

Newsmag

News & Magazine

SEO ready, fast, simple, and easy to use without any coding skills, Newsmag WordPress Theme is designed to help you monetize your website.

Discover more

All-in-one Solution

Control every aspect of your website from a single place. Combine the power of an awesome page builder with an amazing theme. Our WordPress themes make it simple to accomplish your goals. Take your business online today!

Design visually

Powerful. Flexible. Easy. Right on the frontend. Drag and drop, combine, rearrange and shape everything to perfection in a fraction of the usual time. Say Hello to the new you - the experienced web designer!

Fast Websites

You get a fast, out-of-the-box performance-optimized website. With PRO prebuilt websites, you can choose what code the theme is loading on your website and import only what you need. Complete your project in no time!

Build everything visually

Building your business website, blog, news, magazine, hobby, shop or any other website has never been easier. With tagDiv Composer, everything is fully customizable, right on the front end. Just mix, match and arrange within a few click!

Watch the film

Created for professionals

Easy to use for everyone

Website owners

tagDiv themes make building websites easier. You don't have to be a professional web designer to make your vision real. Now, beginners and website owners can build their dream with a powerful visual editor, hundreds of pre-made designs and prebuilt websites.

Freelancers

We are building more than themes. Our solutions are complete toolkits to help you create multiple websites using a single platform that's easy, fast and reliable to use. With features that speed up the design process, you can now deliver your project on time, with less effort.

Agencies

The tagDiv Themes make creating websites faster and more efficient then ever, improving your design process. Your team can build unlimited, unique websites for your clients with a single template.We’re crafting experiences for your business and customers. It's that easy to be a superstar!

Explore Advanced Web Design Technology

Discover the true power of our WordPress Themes in a few features

Simple frontend drag & drop

No Coding Skills Required

Responsive Design Editing

Elements, Effects, Colors & Styles

Pre-built templates gallery

Blocks & Modules Library

Seo and Marketing features

Stunning video capabilities

Woo Commerce Compatible

Simple Undo & Redo Revisions

Dedicated support service

Amazing value for money

...and many, many more!

Start building your website

120,000+ dedicated customers trust us with their projects

You should too!

For me there is only one thing more important than a theme that is fast, versatile and easy to use. I need to change it in any details I want. And I found it all in the Newspaper theme. I’m a great fan and I use it since may 2016. The best!

Daniel Ribeiro

Owner at goeuropa.com.br

The experience with Newspaper Theme is great! We easily built the website using the Nomad demo and all the infinite customization possibilities. We also recommend it for the excellent support, we got quick and comprehensive answers.

Alessio Pellegrini

SEO, terraincognita.earth

Great theme! We used Newspaper theme more than once for client’s websites in different industries. We like the unlimited features, speed performance, ease of use and excellent support. Totally Recommended!

Andreas Petrakis

Owner of Stonebug Media

Browse an amazing collection of websites built by our customers!

Newspaper Showcase
Newsmag Showcase

Over 120,000+ Customers Are Already Building Awesome Websites

Join our enthusiastic community to get powerful tools to build your dream, and free lifetime updates. Did we mentioned that we have an awesome customer support?

Buy Now
